g.text: Shared Digital Twin Approach - Lookup of IC Part Type Twin
Customer updates Submodel information (repository pattern only)
Query Connector Catalog for Customer dDTR access
Query DTR for IC Part Type Twin based on specific asset ids
forward request based on Connector asset definitions
Lookup IC Part Type Twin based on ShellDescriptor Id
forward request based on Connector asset definitions
Extract DSP Endpoint and Connector Asset ID for Submodel
Query Connector Catalog for Submodel based on Connector Asset ID
Negotiate Contract for Submodel and init transfer
forward request based on Connector asset definitions
